front.title: A Framework for the delivery of MPEG-4 over IP-based Protocols

abstract.t: This document forms an umbrella specification for the carriage and operation of MPEG-4 multimedia sessions over IP-based protocols, including RTP, RTSP, and HTTP, among others. It addresses IP Multicast as well. It also serves to document the standard MIME types associated with MPEG-4 files.
